committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to terminate the Senior Executive Services unless it is continued by an enactment of the Congress.

summary.text: Terminates the Senior Executive Service (the continuation of which formerly was subject to congressional veto) unless it is continued by an enactment of Congress within 180 days after enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to terminate the Senior Executive Services unless it is continued by an enactment of the Congress.
